blogPost.excerpt: Between payments, user info, chat, live conferencing, email & SMS, you’re racking up over 12 different apps every time you hold a live online class. With Classtra, you can build your own branded live learning platform to take care of it all in one place.
blogPost.body: Between payments, user info, chat, live conferencing, email & SMS, you’re racking up over 12 different apps every time you hold a live online class. With Classtra, you can build your own branded live learning platform to take care of it all in one place.
blogPost.title: Classtra 3.0 - Create your own live learning platform
blogPost.author: Ahmed Saleh

localize.description: 在支付、用户信息、聊天、实时会议、电子邮件和短信之间，每次举办在线直播课时，你都会积累超过12个不同的应用程序。有了Classtra，你可以建立自己的品牌直播学习平台，在一个地方就能搞定这一切。
localize.tagline: 创建自己的直播学习平台

localize.description: 在支付、用戶信息、聊天、實時會議、電子郵件和短信之間，每次舉辦在線直播課時，你都會積累超過12個不同的應用程序。有了Classtra，你可以建立自己的品牌直播學習平臺，在一個地方就能搞定這一切。
localize.tagline: 創建自己的直播學習平臺

previous.excerpt: Voices you'll love on productivity, strategy, and more—all for one bundle price. New writers join every month. Access to an evergreen archive of 200+ essays, read by 750k+ curious business people.
previous.title: Every - A writer collective covering productivity, strategy, & more

localize.description: 你会喜欢的关于生产力、战略等方面的声音--所有这些都只需一个捆绑价格。每月都有新作者加入。访问由75万+好奇的商务人士阅读的200多篇文章组成的常青档案。
localize.tagline: 一个涵盖生产力、战略等内容的作家集体。

localize.description: 你會喜歡的關於生產力、戰略等方面的聲音--所有這些都只需一個捆綁價格。每月都有新作者加入。訪問由75萬+好奇的商務人士閱讀的200多篇文章組成的常青檔案。
localize.tagline: 一個涵蓋生產力、戰略等內容的作家集體。

next.excerpt: Resquared is a web app that has data on every local business and makes it easy to reach out to them with built-in marketing tools. If you were trying to sell to restaurants, you’d open Resquared, create a search, and have access to thousands of restaurants.
next.title: Resquared - Marketing software for reaching local businesses.

localize.description: Resquared是一款网络应用，它拥有当地每家企业的数据，并通过内置的营销工具让你轻松接触到他们。如果你想向餐馆销售，你会打开Resquared，创建一个搜索，并可以访问成千上万的餐馆。
localize.tagline: 覆盖本地企业的营销软件。

localize.description: Resquared是一款網絡應用，它擁有當地每家企業的數據，並通過內置的營銷工具讓你輕鬆接觸到他們。如果你想向餐館銷售，你會打開Resquared，創建一個搜索，並可以訪問成千上萬的餐館。
localize.tagline: 覆蓋本地企業的營銷軟件。
